title: ImageBatch
description: This schema is used to set images for merchant SKUs

main_image_url.description: URL location where Jet.com can access the image. The images should be 1500 x 1500 pixels or larger. There is no limit to image size.

swatch_image_url.description: URL location where Jet.com can access an image of a color or fabric for a given merchant SKU. The images should be 1500 x 1500 pixels or larger. There is no limit to image size.

image_slot_id.description: The slot that the alternate image should be uploaded to.  Jet.com supports up to 8 images (or 8 image slots).

image_url.description: The absolute location where Jet.com can retrieve the image
